snippet: Savania Davies-Keiller and Michael Capotosto wanted to sell their condo and rent a place so they would be better positioned to buy a house in New England.
abstract: The Hunt column on the search by Savania Davies-Keiller and Michael Capotosto for rental apartment in Manhattan for under $6,000 a month; couple found two-bedroom on Varick Street in SoHo.
lead_paragraph: Savania Davies-Keiller and Michael Capotosto wanted to sell their condo and rent a place so they would be better positioned to buy a house in New England.

headline.print_headline: Must Be Prewar; Quirky Is O.K.
headline.seo: The Hunt - Must Be Prewar; Quirky Is O.K.
